title: (x) slab headline face and sans body text in Idpure magazine - Faxo, Kaiser {Pieter}
content:
Sorry if this is a real easy one. The header, as well as the body copy.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeid_3751.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085325im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeid2_4313.jpg)
  
Thank you in Advance  
-Adam
author: AdamBegin

comments.content: I’m sure I’ve seen this. Reminds me of [FF Alega Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085325/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11390.0.0) and [Cholla Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085325/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=E.105684.0.0). What’s the name of the publication?
Whatever It is, I liked this face so much. Now even I want to know which face is this.

Headline typeface is Faxo by t26.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=faxo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085325/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=faxo "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=faxo")

Pieter

Body is Kaiser bij t26.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kaiser/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501085325/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kaiser/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/kaiser/")

Pieter

As you can read in the colophon of the magazine... ;)

Pieter
Ahhh! You would be correct, thank you very much.

You are welcome. It’s a nice magazine.  
Pieter

It’s good to read here :)  
Both, Faxo and Kaiser are very nice … and cheap.
Kaiser is nice, but no italics. Too bad.
